content: a ribbed beanie that is warm enough to be worn on the coldest wettest spring morning while out on the block putting your first box in the ground and stylish enough to be worn in town on day off without locals knowing that you re a planter maybe this toque can be knit using any worsted weight wool great for stash busting you will need approximately 160-180 m one skein of any of the listed wool suggestions will work perfectly since it is knit in ribbing it will be very stretchy and gauge isn t *super* important i was able to knit this toque to 20 sts over 4 inches using a 4 mm us 6 needle i love seeing your finished projects on here and on instagram tag @makewitherin and use the hashtag #treeplantertoque happy knitting
